body.name: HOMEXCEL Laundry Detergent Sheets, Fresh Scent, Eco-Friendly, 80 Count, Plastic-Free, Hypoallergenic, Low-Foam, Easy to Use, Gentle Skin Care, Travel-Friendly

features: Superior Cleaning Efficiency: Laundry detergent sheets are formulated with low-foaming and safe ingredients, effectively removing stains. they are especially suitable for HE washing machines, requiring only a small amount of water and foam to achieve stronger cleaning power.

Easy to Use & Better Dissolving: Half a sheet for a regular load (when the drum is half full) 1 sheet for a full load (when the drum is 3/4 full) and 2 sheets for an extra-full load. Our washing detergent sheets dissolve completely in both hot and cold water and can be used in conventional and high-efficiency washing machines.

Gentle Skin Care: Low-foam laundry sheets are designed to minimize foam production, reducing the risk of allergies. This means they contain no phosphates, parabens, phthalates, or chlorine bleach! They not only get rid of stains with incredible cleaning power but more importantly, protect your delicate skin.

Zero Waste & No Plastic Jug: Our packaging & design save space, and mess while actively contributing to earth’s environmental protection. Our aim is to make cleaning more convenient and eco-friendly. It will reduce your carbon footprint simply by switching from heavy laundry pods.

Travel-Friendly: These paper laundry detergent sheets are individually packaged, which makes them lightweight and easy to store. Note: Like other laundry sheets, Homexcel laundry sheets only have a fresh scent during the washing process and do not leave any fragrance on the clothes.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Powerful Cleaning Efficiency Dissolve rapidly quickly and effortlessly removing stains and revitalizing your clothes.Suitable for front, top-loaders, and high-efficiency machines. Accurate Amount of Zero Waste Effortlessly measure the detergent sheet you need. Simply place the sheet in the washing machine, start the machine, and effort to avoid waste. Compact Size, Big Space Saver Say goodbye to the hassle of bulky detergent bottles and packaging clutter. Our sheets are ideal for compact laundry areas, making storage a breeze! HOMEXCEL Laundry Sheets Make a sustainable choice with our laundry detergent sheets! Say goodbye to plastic jugs, cut carbon emissions, and contribute to a cleaner future.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Laundry Game-Changer – Five Stars for Simplicity and Sensitivity!
reviews.reviewText: These laundry sheets have revolutionized my laundry routine, earning them a well-deserved five-star rating. The convenience they offer over liquid detergent or pods is unbeatable – just toss a sheet in with the laundry, and you're done!Not only are these sheets easy to use, but they also exude an environmentally friendly vibe, reducing plastic waste associated with traditional detergent packaging. The light scent they leave on the clothes is refreshing without being overpowering, creating a pleasant, subtle aroma.One of the standout features for me is their gentleness on sensitive skin. My daughter, who struggles with eczema, has experienced no irritation since we made the switch. It's a relief to find a product that not only simplifies the laundry process but also considers the well-being of those with sensitive skin.In conclusion, these laundry sheets are a game-changer for anyone seeking a convenient, eco-friendly, and skin-sensitive solution. Five stars all the way – highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars They are fine...
reviews.reviewText: They work. Don't have much scent (which is fine).They don't suds up. Neither do many natural soaps. So, suds don't necessarily mean clean.They are great for space savings, especially in RVs and campers. Plus, you don't have to worry about altitudes or temps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: They clean well, take up very little space, & they are fragrance free. I will definitely buy this product again; it's a good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got these for my husband work clothes, it's not fully a load just like 2 jeans 2 shirts and a sweater. I hated using a huge tide pod for a 30 min wash. So I got these, they seem to wash well. His clothes smells clean but not with that heavy perfume smell that he hates. The sheets split in two. I use the whole sheet. U can split for smaller loads which is a plus. I'll be buying again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and cheap
reviews.reviewText: Works great and I'm not going to have to buy detergent for over a year lol I really love these. Convenient, small and easy to store, and soooo many washes for so little.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars fragrance free soap detergent strips
reviews.reviewText: I like the size and the ability to tear to size of loads. Not too worry no soapy residue on clothing regardless of size of load as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this product
reviews.reviewText: So convenient and cleans clothes wonderfully and very economical! I love how you can cut the sheets for small loads I think I’ll always use this product because it saves sooo much money 7$ for 160 loads unbelievable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Switch to these right now!
reviews.reviewText: There are nothing but positive benefits to using these laundry detergent sheets. It works, costs a fraction of the price of the detergent I've been using, creates practically no waste & is easy on washing machines. I have a large family & the Giant detergent jugs take up a lot of space in our garbage & cabinet, plus sometimes they leak out a bit & create a soapy mess. I wish I had discovered these sooner bc I've basically been paying for mostly water in a jug that will only contribute to an ever growing mountain of trash.
